title: Special Topic Workshop: Draw Like a Cubist
description:
Learn to see and draw like a cubist! Taking inspiration from works in the museum’s galleries, participants will explore the origin, stages, and range of techniques of Cubism, the movement that most permeated 20th-century art. Some prior drawing experience is recommended, though not required. All materials will be provided.

Click here to see all upcoming sketch classes and workshops. For additional information, please call (312) 443-3680 or email museum-programs@artic.edu. Classes are recommended for ages 16 and up.

To request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program, please call (312) 443-3680 or send an email to access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible.

Please see the museum’s Accessibility page for more information.
